name: VIR-266.02 Verify that when customer hovers the link, the preview information message with details of the specification is shown

userStory.narrative:
As a customer I would like to be shown a link that allows me to view the specification and material
On click it will open the specification in a new tab
AND
On hover it will show an information message with details of the specification
